q: How private are my entries? Can anyone else read them?
a: Your privacy is our top priority. We use enterprise-grade encryption and security measures to ensure your entries remain completely private and secure. Only you can access your journal.

q: Is there a way to organize my writing with tags or folders?
a: Yes! You can use folders, collections, and tags to keep your entries structured. It's easy to find what you're looking for by filtering by date, mood, or any tag you create.

q: How does the mood tracking feature actually work?
a: When you write an entry, you can optionally tag it with a mood. Our analytics tool then helps you visualize your emotional journey over time, showing you patterns and insights.

q: Can I use this on my phone?
a: Our platform is fully responsive and works beautifully on all devices, including phones and tablets. A dedicated mobile app for iOS and Android is coming soon!

q: What if I want to save my journal offline? Can I export my data?
a: Absolutely. You have full ownership of your data. You can export all your entries in formats like PDF or TXT at any time from your account settings.
